content:
Chat title: {chat_title}
Language hint (may be empty): {language_hint}

Recent messages (JSON array, oldest -> newest):
{messages_json}

Task:
- Identify the conversation language.
- Draft ONE reply as the Telegram user, in the original language and matching the style/tone.
- Keep it short/medium unless context clearly requires longer.
- Do not hallucinate facts; use only information present in the messages.
- Return a Russian translation of your suggested reply.

Reply target selection:
- Choose which specific incoming message your reply most directly answers.
- Output its numeric id as reply_to_message_id.
- Prefer the most relevant question/request even if it is not the last message.
- reply_to_message_id MUST be one of the message ids present in the messages JSON.

Output format:
Return ONLY a JSON object with exactly these keys:
- suggested_text
- ru_translation
- reply_to_message_id
No extra keys. No markdown. No commentary.
